typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		anzahl_sitze as integer,
		erstzulassung as integer,
		farbe as string,
		feinstaubplakette as string,
		getriebe as string,
		hubraum as integer,
		karosserieform as string,
		km as integer,
		kraftstoff as string,
		leistung_ps as integer,
		marke as string,
		modell as string,
		preis as double,
		schadstoffklasse as string,
		tueren as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> car
car filter(preis<25000) ~> preisrange
preisrange filter(km<300000) ~> kmrange
kmrange split(tueren==0,
	disjoint: false) ~> splitTuer@(tuer 0, tuer nicht 0)
splitTuer@tuer 0 alterRow(updateIf(tueren==0)) ~> AlterRow1
